abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32860499, pmid32876775, pmid32877231, pmid32809155, pmid32881007, pmid32864911, pmid32877214, pmid32876341, pmid32870539, pmid32895055
